about_the_game:
STAGDRAFT is a chaotic 2D top-down multiplayer wargame that brings medieval fantasy battles with Hack and Slash PvP action, STAGDRAFT supports up to 24 players and lets you roleplay as one of five ranges of classes: Swordsman, Spearman, Ranger, Magic Staff, and Berserker. The objective is simple yet challenging: capture all the zones along with your allies and secure the final objective to claim your victory in a brutal domination warfare!



STAGDRAFT is also accessible for a cross-platform multiplayer, allowing you to combat through PC or mobile device. Get ready to experience the chaotic excitement of medieval combat! Strategize with your allies, and dominate the battleground in this epic fantasy wargame against the enemies.

Features:

  • Playable Up to 16 Players: Engage in intense 24-player battles with friends and rivals.
  • Five Unique Classes: Swordsman, Spearman, Ranger, Magic Staff, or Berserker.
  • Diverse Skills: Utilize Shields, Magic Projectiles, and Buffs to enhance your strategy.
  • Frontline Gamemode: Capture and push the zones forward to achieve victory.
  • Cross Platform Multiplayer: Available on PC and mobile devices.
  • Immersive 2D Pixel-Art: Crafted with a nostalgic pixel-art graphics.
